website_summaries.verdict: A quality relaxer with ingredients that nourish hair. Delivers results consumers love without leaving hair feeling dry or brittle when applied as directed.
pros: Contains olive oil, herbal extracts, and other plant-based ingredients that condition hair, and leave it feeling soft
Does a good job taming frizz, and works well for different types of curls
cons: Some owners gripe that the kit doesn't include gloves or a tool to mix the solutions

customer_reviews.title: I really like this relaxer and my hair looks awesome however I ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this relaxer and my hair looks awesome however I was a bit baffled when I saw the contents of the box. It had just the cream and activator shampoo and conditioner. This was my first time buying and it may be my last. All the past relaxer kits I bought came with a paper of directions with gloves attached and a stick to mix the solution this did not come with that. I did not have mixing sticks and gloves on hand for a relaxer kit everything that was needed to use this product was not included.
